thread.title: Minor leaguers suing MLB granted conditional class status
thread.title_full: Minor leaguers suing MLB granted conditional class status

title: Minor leaguers suing MLB granted conditional class status
text: Minor leaguers suing MLB granted conditional class status Tuesday, 20 October 2015 (1 minute ago) A federal judge in California has granted conditional class certification to minor league baseball players who are suing Major League Baseball teams for failing to pay them minimum wage.
